text: Françoise Héritier (15 November 1933 – 15 November 2017) was a French anthropologist, ethnologist, and feminist. She worked at the Collège de France (Chair of Comparative Studies of African Societies from 1982 to 1998). Her work deals mainly with the theory of alliances and on the prohibition of incest. She was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 1990. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2017 deaths Category:French philosophers Category:French feminists Category:Academics of the Collège de France Category:French ethnologists Category:People from Loire Category:Writers from Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes Category:Members of Academia Europaea
title: Françoise Héritier
